channel.description:

[B]Visionary Based (Hardcore PVP)[/b]
[center]http://astropk.org/playnow.html[/center]
[B]New Features[/B] [B]Exodus Strike (Kills 3)/God Mode/1000 HitPoints/Fly Mode/[/B]
[b]Full bounty hunter, clanchat Full summoning with following, interactions, around 25 scrolls working, skills bonuses, timers, Growing Pets Full bank tabs with the main one displaying all the tabs etc, Full farming with configs Entity based combat A lot of achievements, 70+ Full 667 kill tab with proper tooltips and skill goals[/B]
